info.assetDescription: Money you have, like bank balance, cash, gold, or investments. These accounts track what you own and can have opening balances. Examples include savings accounts, checking accounts, fixed deposits, stocks, mutual funds, gold, property, and cash in hand.
info.liabilityDescription: Loans, credit card dues, or any money you need to pay. These accounts track what you owe to others and can have opening balances. Examples include home loans, car loans, personal loans, credit card balances, education loans, and any other debts you need to repay.
info.incomeDescription: Salary, business income, rent, or any money coming in. These accounts track sources of money you receive. Examples include salary, freelance income, business profits, rental income, dividends, interest earned, gifts received, and any other money coming into your accounts.
info.expenseDescription: Daily costs like food, bills, travel, shopping, etc. These accounts track where your money goes. Examples include groceries, utilities, rent, transportation, entertainment, medical expenses, education fees, shopping, dining out, and any other money you spend.

overview.title: Overview
overview.content: DailyMunim (Ghar Ka Daily Hisab Kitab) is a comprehensive personal finance and expense tracking application designed for Indian users. Track your daily expenses, manage multiple accounts, set up recurring transactions, and generate detailed financial reports.

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.content: First time setup involves creating an account, setting up a secure PIN, and adding your first bank or cash account to start tracking.

installation.title: Installation
installation.content:
1. Download the app
2. Install and open
3. Sign up with email
4. Set up PIN for security

firstTimeSetup.title: First Time Setup
firstTimeSetup.content:
1. Authentication: Create account
2. PIN Setup: 4-6 digit PIN
3. Add Account: Create your first account
4. Start Tracking: Add transactions

accountManagement.title: Account Management
accountManagement.content: Manage your bank accounts, cash wallets, and credit cards in one place.

addingAccounts.title: Adding Accounts
addingAccounts.content: Go to Accounts tab -> Tap + Add Account -> Choose account type -> Enter details.

accountTypes.title: Account Types
accountTypes.content:
• Bank Account: Savings, Current
• Cash Account: Wallet, Petty Cash
• Credit Card: Monitor spending

transactionManagement.title: Transaction Management
transactionManagement.content: Record income and expenses manually or import from SMS.

addingTransactions.title: Adding Transactions
addingTransactions.content: Go to Transactions tab -> Tap + Add Transaction -> Select Income/Expense -> Enter details -> Save.

smsImport.title: SMS Import
smsImport.content: Go to More -> SMS Import -> Grant permissions -> Select bank SMS -> App automatically extracts details.

recurringTransactions.title: Recurring Transactions
recurringTransactions.content: Set up automatic transactions for regular bills, salaries, or subscriptions.

settingUp.title: Setting Up
settingUp.content: Go to More -> Repeat Transactions -> Tap + Add Recurring -> Set amount, frequency, and dates.

types.title: Types
types.content: Fixed/Variable amounts for Income (Salary) or Expense (Bills).

reportsAnalytics.title: Reports & Analytics
reportsAnalytics.content: Gain insights into your spending habits with detailed reports.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.content: Overview of total balance, monthly income/expense, and recent transactions.

detailedReports.title: Detailed Reports
detailedReports.content: Day-to-Day summaries, Month-to-Month comparisons, and Category-wise breakdowns.

settingsSecurity.title: Settings & Security
settingsSecurity.content: Customize your app experience and keep your data safe.

security.title: Security
security.content: Change PIN, Enable Biometric (Fingerprint/Face ID), Auto-lock settings.

appNotSyncing.title: App Not Syncing
appNotSyncing.content: Check internet connection, force refresh, or restart app.

pinIssues.title: PIN Issues
pinIssues.content: Use account recovery if forgotten, or reset through email.
